title: ViewRay gets $30mm through debt financing with CRG; could draw down another $20mm
text:
ViewRay gets $30mm through debt financing with CRG; could draw down another $20mm Deal Date: Jun-01-2015 / Deal # 201530515 Executive Summary 
ViewRay Inc. (MRI-guided radiation) secured a $50mm loan from CRG (formerly Capital Royaltly). The company got $30mm up front (payable interest-only for three years), and could draw down another $20mm following achievement of certain milestones. The financing is the first for ViewRay since it withdrew an IPO filing in April; the company had hoped to raise up to $56mm.
